title: Musan Salama
text:
Musan Salama (acronym MuSa) is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Pori">Pori</a>, <a href="Finland">Finland</a>, currently playing in the Finnish second tier <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a>. It was founded in 1960 in the <a href="Musa%20%28Pori%29">Musa</a> suburb of Pori. Literally, the name of the club means the ″Lightning of Musa″.
Musan Salama has mostly played in the Finnish third or fourth levels. In 1999–2001 MuSa made a three-year spell to the second tier <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a>, but was relegated after the 2001 season. In 2016 MuSa made it to the promotion play-offs losing to the <a href="Helsinki">Helsinki</a> side <a href="Gnistan">Gnistan</a> on penalties. Finally, in 2018 MuSa achieved promotion back to the second tier <a href="Ykk%C3%B6nen">Ykkönen</a> by defeating Kokkola based side <a href="GBK%20Kokkola">GBK</a> in the finals of the promotion playoffs on penalties. 
MuSa is a member of the <a href="Finnish%20Workers%27%20Sports%20Federation">Finnish Workers' Sports Federation</a>.
